name: @ganeshdole/scrolltotop
description: In a React Single Page Application (SPA), users often expect the view to scroll to the top when they navigate to a new page. Without this functionality, users might find themselves starting at an arbitrary scroll position, which can be confusing and lead to a poor user experience. The following approaches ensure that the window scrolls to the top whenever a new page is loaded using React Router.
author: Ganesh Dole
